projects.name: Post-Secondary School Map
projects.short: I created a maping application that maps different potential universities to attend in the near future. By using folium and pandas I was successfully able to create a mapping application

projects.name: User Interacting Filter
projects.short: Created with OpenCV2 and numpy, this is a user friendly filter that allows for the user to interact through the terminal different texts they want on their head!

projects.name: Randomized Meme Filter
projects.short: A filter that randomizes different captions to the users head for them to make different faces and share with their friends!

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.short: A portfolio created to showcase different projects made in my coding career!

projects.name: Choose your own Adventure Game
projects.short: A choose your own adventure game that can be played in a terminal!
